room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: My family and I had a fantastic time trying to figure out The Heist. The rooms were very well done and laid out. We loved the details and the steps required to move forward in the game.Although we didn’t quite make it (we literally had the painting and informational to get out of the room before the time ran out), the experience was a blast! The staff was extremely helpful and made the game all the more enjoyable. We’re looking forward for when we can come back and try the other games offered.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: Had a great time escaping The Heist with 4 other family members and two very intelligent young ladies we were teamed up with. Will definitely be back to try the other games.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: We had a great time doing the Heist! The room was so cool and props were great. We had to ask for several clues. It was just my 2 boys and myself. We luckily figured it out in the nick of time and found the missing painting!!! Many things to make you think for sure.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: My wife and I were on our honeymoon in Pigeon Forge. We read about the Escape Game, we booked (Prison Break) and had an absolutely awesome time! Two days later, we booked (Heist), and the fun continued there! If you enjoy a challenge we highly recommend (Prison Break ).

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: My husband and I came down to Pigeon Forge for our anniversary and spent the evening in the Art Heist room. It was awesome and I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting
